EmailTemplate.subject: Followup regarding my site visit on 8/6/2013
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for meeting with me two weeks ago. I've included some notes and pictures from my findings on site as well as an electronic copy of the production report and letter that I handed over during the visit. I've also included a quote for cleaning services toward the end of this email if you still have interest.
Notes from Site Visit: -
Cleaning Services: - We can arrange to have the system cleaned by our preferred module washer on the East Coast for $X,XXX. If you're interested in a full O&M plan that includes active system monitoring, an annual site inspection and cleaning, we can also price out a package for that. Please 'reply all' to this email and Matt Murphy (cc-ed here) can orchestrate either option.
If you're interested in cleaning services or a more robust O&M package please respond to me and Matt Murphy (O&M Manager, cc-ed on this email) and we can draft up a formal contract.
I hope you were able to find a nice place to hang the picture. Thanks again for your time and for choosing Borrego Solar - we sincerely appreciate your business.
Cheers, Tommy Sunderland
P.S. I 'liked' your company on Facebook and was able to tag the company in a post from my site visit - another nice picture of the installation. Feel free to share the post on your wall if you'd like.
--
Tommy Sunderland
Customer Experience Manager
